div.p: I arrived here early this morning safe and sound and not very tired The river is very full from the Ohio and we ran down nicely. I have got my money and made out my account for North Deer and will get that after a while I have not seen any one yet being by in the Treas Dept and expect to get off this evening I did not have any time to spare in Cairo so did not see the Hubbards, will write as soon as I get back Love and Kisses to all
